@value [nvarchar](MAX) ) RETURNS [int] AS BEGIN DECLARE @buffer [varbinary](MAX) DECLARE @hashcode [bigint] DECLARE @index [int] DECLARE @length [int] DECLARE @octet [bigint] DECLARE @MINOR_UPPER_BOUND [bigint] DECLARE @MAJOR_UPPER_BOUND [bigint]
SET @MINOR_UPPER_BOUND = 2147483648 SET @MAJOR_UPPER_BOUND = 4294967296
SET @buffer = CAST(@value AS VARBINARY(MAX)) SET @length = LEN(@buffer) SET @index = 1
SET @hashcode = @SEED WHILE @index <= (@length) BEGIN SET @octet = SUBSTRING(@buffer, @index, 1) SET @index = @index + 1 SET @hashcode = ((@hashcode * @MULTIPLIER) + @octet) % @MAJOR_UPPER_BOUND END
SET @hashcode = CASE WHEN @hashcode >= @MINOR_UPPER_BOUND THEN @hashcode - @MAJOR_UPPER_BOUND ELSE @hashcode END SET @hashcode = CASE WHEN @hashcode < 0 THEN @hashcode + @MINOR_UPPER_BOUND ELSE @hashcode END % @HASH_BUCKET_SIZE
RETURN CAST(@hashcode AS [int]) END GO
